titleStmt.title: We had hoped, seeing it is notorious to all our subiects, how greatly we delight in the exercise of hunting, as well for our recreation, ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie.,

notesStmt.note: Title from first lines of text.
Dated at end: Hampton Court the ix. day of September, in the seuenth yeere of our reigne ...
Forbidding deer hunting in royal forests. Cf. STC.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
